sqlList.sql: select o.*,b.StartDate,b.EndDate from t_lm_order o,(select :StartDate AS StartDate,:EndDate as EndDate from dual) b where create_time >= TO_DATE(:StartDate ||' 04:00:00', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and create_time <TO_DATE(:EndDate ||' 04:00:00', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND contact_name not like '%测试%'

select o.*,b.* from t_lm_order o,(select to_char(sysdate-1, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS YESTERDATE2 from dual) b where create_time >= TO_DATE((to_char(sysdate-1 , 'yyyy-MM-dd')||' 04:00:00'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and create_time < TO_DATE((to_char(sysdate , 'yyyy-MM-dd')||' 04:00:00'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND contact_name not like '%测试%'
